short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for social tagging on content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can tag different times of videos and see all the tags that other users put on the video.

To do this, you must first register or login to your account.

To do this, click on the extension icon and enter your email and password. If you have not registered before, click on the register button, otherwise click the login button.

After this, tagging will be enabled on the online videos.

Version 1.1: some bug fixes
